title.rendered: Mexc Review, How To Create Mexc Account

content.rendered:
Mexc Review, MEXC Global is a digital asset service provider known for being the exchange of high-performance and mega transaction matching technology. The exchange provides real-time prices of crypto tokens such as Bitcoin BTC, Litecoin LTC, and Ethereum ETH.

Table of Contents

  • What is MEXC?
  • Mecx Review
    • Pros:
    • Cons:
  • How To Create Mexc Account
  • Verdict

What is MEXC?

Mexc Review, MEXC is a professional cryptocurrency exchange that is also known by the name MEXC Global. Founded in 2018, MEXC has focused on being a high-performance exchange with easy and efficient transactions throughout the platform. Not only that, but they also claim that the team working behind MEXC Global exchange are the ultimate pioneers of blockchain technology, exploring it since the beginning.

Mexc Review, How To Create Mexc Account

Create MEXC Account

MEXC Global is available almost throughout the world as they have acquired the official licenses to offer their services in different countries. Those countries also include Australia, Canada, and the United States of America. The exchange has a variety of options to offer their customers so that they can trade, buy, and sell digital assets right away. With the availability of a great customer support team, you can see that they prioritize customer satisfaction.

 

  • Web Address: www.mexc.com

  • Main location: Mahé, Seychelles

  • Cryptocurrencies: MX, BTC, ETH, EOS, BCH, LTC & 200+ more

  • Fiat Currencies: USD, TWD, AED, PHP, AUD, JPY, CAD, EUR & more

  • Deposit Methods:  Visa/Mastercard, Bank Cards, Bank Transfer, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Cryptocurrency

  • Deposit Fees: Varies

  • Trading Fees: Maker: 0.2%, Taker: 0.2%

  • Mobile app: Yes

Mecx Review

Pros:

  • Over 200+ cryptocurrencies available
  • Several different trading markets
  • Staking available on several cryptocurrencies
  • Leverage trading up to 125x supported
  • Mobile app for Android users

Cons:

  • Unclear fiat deposit and withdrawal fees
  • No iOS mobile app

How To Create Mexc Account

How to Sign up a MEXC Account:

Create MEXC Account

1: Registration through MEXC official website

Enter MEXC official website https://www.mexc.com/ and click [Sign up] on the upper right corner to enter the registration page.

You may also enter the registration page by clicking the invitation link given by your friend. (The invitation code will be filled by the system automatically.)

You can register an account using either your mobile phone number or your E-mail address.

2: Input your mobile phone number or E-mail address and ensure the validity of your phone number or E-mail address.

Email

Phone number

3: Input your login password. Password can only be constituted by numbers and letters, special characters are invalid.

4: Input your login password in the box again.

5: Click [Get code] on the right side to acquire the code by a short message or E-mail. And then input the verification code received. (Check the trash box if no E-mail is received)

6: If you are invited to trade on the MEXC platform, you can request an invitation code from the one who invited you and fill it in. If no invitation code is available, it’s ok to leave it blank.

7: Read the User Agreement and click the box to agree.

8: Click [Sign Up].

9: You can login after “Registration succeeded” is displayed.

Create MEXC Account

Verdict

MEXC is a worldwide crypto exchange offering its services to almost all major countries, including the USA. MEXC attracts many traders and investors, With their user-friendly UI, they also offer beginner or amateur users a suitable experience to explore everything and get started.

Overall, MEXC can be a great choice for any trader who is looking forward to professional trading and wide investing options
